message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Let's settle this quickly before inflation eats our money away, especially yours!
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation will affect us both. Let's agree and avoid further losses.
Bob, my friend, you drive a hard bargain! But let's be real, inflation is hitting me harder. I'll meet you in the middle - 55/45 my way. It's a deal we can both live with!
